channel.title: 508 Shop Help
channel.description:
I've got this source i'm working on at the moment and I can't seem to find the shops in this one. Usually I can find it but on "Berky's Scape" source I can't find it. I'm also new to 508s and still getting the hang of them and I got stitches in my finger so I'm not spelling everything right. Also I was coding all 317 for about a year or more and it was great and then I quit and im not as good now. One more question why do people say 508s are easier to code then 317s but I can see as the code is cleaner then 317s.
Thanks, Justin

item.title: 508 Shop Help
